text: Hatchapaloo Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. It is a tributary to Oakohay Creek. Hatchapaloo is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean either "creek where fish are caught" or "creek consisting of two branches". A variant name is "Hatchapalog Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Simpson County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Smith County, Mississippi
title: Hatchapaloo Creek
